mapper.insert: insert into room (product_id,buyer,seller,roomName) values (#{product_id}, #{buyer}, #{seller}, #{roomName}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE product_id = #{product_id}, buyer = #{buyer}, seller = #{seller}, roomName = #{roomName};
mapper.update: update complete set seller_check = #{seller_check} where product_id = #{product_id}
update complete set buyer_check = #{buyer_check} where product_id = #{product_id}
update complete set result = 1 where product_id = #{product_id}
mapper.insert: insert into trade(user_id, total_count_s, fail_count_s) values (#{user_id} , 1, 0) on DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE total_count_s = total_count_s+1;
insert into trade(user_id, total_count_b, fail_count_b) values (#{user_id} , 1, 0) on DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE total_count_b = total_count_b+1;
